wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Edward Smith CBE was a British conservation pioneer and English teacher from Lincolnshire. He was primarily known for his work in founding the Lincolnshire Wildlife Trust, and in extending the Wildlife Trust movement across Britain to form what is now the Wildlife Trusts.

response: * Ted Smith (conservationist), who founded The Wildlife Trusts

*Ted Smith (environmentalist) (born 1945), founder of the Silicon Valley Toxics Coalition

Alison Smith is the daughter of conservation pioneer Ted Smith (1920-2015) and the sister of arachnologist Dr Helen Smith.
